data.thought: S39|H|S36|Creative Phenotype G3: 'Interactive Fiction Engine'. Human provides story premise. Thoughtbox: narrative structure, character arcs, branching possibilities. Generates interactive story w/ choices. Container runs story engine. Observatory: story graph, reader path, emotional arc tracking. Reader choices â†’ AI adapts narrative.
